message:
One of the not-very-famous tools that I find indispensable in my daily workflow, on Linux I use Klipper, parcelite or even Glipper but on Windows it must be a third-party tool and Ditto does the job very well.

I use Windows+V to invoke it but this stopped working since Windows 8, so I switched to Alt+Shift+V
story: Diaa Sami shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Ditto
caption: sourceforge.net
description: Ditto download. Ditto 2015-01-11 04:30:43 free download. Ditto Ditto is an extension to the standard windows clipboard. It saves each item placed on the clipboard allowing you access to any of those items at a later t
